contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road | state=IL | type=IL | route = 50 | previous_route = 50 | previous_type = US | next_route = 51 | next_type = US | length_mi = 66.49 | length_ref = <ref name=t2>{{cite web |author=Illinois Technology Transfer Center |url=http://www.dot.state.il.us/gist2/select.html |title=T2 GIS Data |accessdate=2007-11-08 |year=2006}}</ref> | direction_b = North |direction_a=South | established = 1924<ref name=n9jig>Carlson, Rick. [http://www.n9jig.com/41-60.html Illinois State Highways Page: Routes 41 thru 60]. Last updated March 15, 2006. Retrieved March 23, 2006.</ref> | terminus_a = {{jct|state=IL|US|45|US|52}} in [[Kankakee, Illinois|Kankakee]] | junction = {{jct|state=IL|I|57}} in [[Bradley, Illinois|Bradley]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|US|30}} in [[Matteson, Illinois|Matteson]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|US|6}} in [[Oak Forest, Illinois|Oak Forest]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|I|294}} in [[Alsip, Illinois|Alsip]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|US|12|US|20}} in [[Oak Lawn, Illinois|Oak Lawn]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|I|55}} in [[Chicago]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|I|290|IL|110}} in [[Chicago]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|I|94}} in [[Chicago]]<br>{{jct|state=IL|US|14}} in [[Chicago]] | terminus_b = {{jct|state=IL|US|41}} in [[Skokie, Illinois|Skokie]] | counties = [[Kankakee County|Kankakee]], [[Will County, Illinois|Will]], [[Cook County, Illinois|Cook]], }} '''Illinois Route 50''' is a north–south state road in northeastern [[Illinois]]. It runs from the junction with [[U.S. Route 45]] in [[Kankakee, Illinois|West Kankakee]] north to [[U.S. Route 41]] in [[Skokie, Illinois|Skokie]]. This is a distance of {{convert|66.49|mi|km}}.<ref name="t2" /> In [[Chicago]] and the suburbs it's known as [[Cicero Avenue]]. Before this, Cicero Avenue was previously known as 48th Avenue, owing to its City of Chicago address of 4800 West.<ref>{{cite web|title=Talbot's Industry and Work Map|url=http://www.lib.uchicago.edu/e/su/maps/chi1900/G4104-C6P3-1904-T3-N.html|work=Chicago, 1900-1914|publisher=University of Chicago Library|accessdate=14 July 2011}}</ref> ==Major intersections== {| class=wikitable !County !Location !Junction !Notes |- |rowspan=3|[[Kankakee County, Illinois|Kankakee]] |rowspan=2|[[Kankakee, Illinois|Kankakee]] |{{jct|state=IL|US|45|US|52}} | Southern Terminus |- |{{jct|state=IL|IL|17}} | |- |[[Bourbonnais, Illinois|Bourbonnais]] |{{jct|state=IL|I|57}} | |- |rowspan=13|[[Cook County, Illinois|Cook]] |[[Matteson, Illinois|Matteson]] |{{jct|state=IL|US|30|Lincoln}} | IL 50 runs through [[Will County, Illinois|Will County]], but has no major intersections. |- |[[Oak Forest, Illinois|Oak Forest]] |{{jct|state=IL|US|6|}} | right by the train station |- |[[Midlothian, Illinois|Midlothian]] |{{jct|state=IL|IL|83}} | South end of IL 83 concurrency |- |rowspan=2|[[Alsip, Illinois|Alsip]] |{{jct|state=IL|IL|83}} | North end of IL 83 concurrency |- |{{jct|state=IL|I|294}} | Southbound entrance on 127th Ave. |- |[[Oak Lawn, Illinois|Oak Lawn]] |{{jct|state=IL|US|12|US|20}} | |- |rowspan=6|[[Chicago, Illinois|Chicago]] |{{jct|state=IL|I|55}} | |- |{{jct|state=IL|I|290|IL|110}} | No eastbound entrance |- |{{jct|state=IL|IL|64}} | |- |{{jct|state=IL|IL|19}} | |- |{{jct|state=IL|I|94}} | Southbound entrance ONLY |- |{{jct|state=IL|US|14}} | |- |[[Skokie, Illinois|Skokie]] |{{jct|state=IL|US|41}} | Northern Terminus |} ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://highwayexplorer.com/il_EndsPage.php?id=1050&section=1 Illinois Highway Ends: Illinois Route 50] [[Category:State highways in Illinois|050]]
